xs:element.name: ReportColumnList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportColumn, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

xs:element.name: SubReportInformationList
xs:element.msdata:DataType: System.Collections.Generic.List`1[[MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain.Report.ReportInformation, MedicalSystem.AnesWorkStation.Domain, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null]], mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089

ReportTitle.StrSql: WITH MAIN AS ( SELECT '椎管内麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '椎管内麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '非插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '非插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '复合麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '复合麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID ) select anestype, Ⅰ, Ⅱ, Ⅲ, Ⅳ, Ⅴ, Ⅵ, 其他, nvl(Ⅰ, 0) + nvl(Ⅱ, 0) + nvl(Ⅲ, 0) + nvl(Ⅳ, 0) + nvl(Ⅴ, 0) + nvl(Ⅵ, 0) + nvl(其他, 0) ALLNUMS, decode(anestype, '椎管内麻醉', 1, '插管全麻', 2, '非插管全麻', 3, '复合麻醉', 4, 5) sortcol from (select nvl(b.item_name, '其他麻醉方式') anestype, nvl(a.asa, '其他') asagrade, count(*) nums from v_operation_master_v2 a, main b where a.AnesMethod = b.item_value(+) and a.oper_status_code > 35 and (a.asa = :ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL) and a.anes_start_time >= :STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) group by nvl(b.item_name, '其他麻醉方式'), nvl(a.asa, '其他')) pivot(sum(nums) for asagrade in ('Ⅰ级' Ⅰ, 'Ⅱ级' Ⅱ, 'Ⅲ级' Ⅲ, 'Ⅳ级' Ⅳ, 'Ⅴ级' Ⅴ, 'Ⅵ级' Ⅵ, '其他' 其他)) order by sortcol

WITH MAIN AS ( SELECT '椎管内麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '椎管内麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '非插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '非插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '复合麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '复合麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID ) select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a,main b where a.AnesMethod = b.item_value(+) and oper_status_code > 35 and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND ( a.asa =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL ) and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and ( b.ITEM_NAME =:VANESTYPE or ((a.anesmethod not in ( select d.ITEM_VALUE from main d ) or a.anesmethod is null ) and :VANESTYPE='其他麻醉方式' ) )

WITH MAIN AS ( SELECT '椎管内麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '椎管内麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '非插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '非插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '复合麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '复合麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID ) select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a,main b where a.AnesMethod = b.item_value(+) and a.asa ='Ⅰ级' and oper_status_code > 35 and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND ( a.asa =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL ) and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and ( b.ITEM_NAME =:VANESTYPE or ((a.anesmethod not in ( select d.ITEM_VALUE from main d ) or a.anesmethod is null ) and :VANESTYPE='其他麻醉方式' ) )

WITH MAIN AS ( SELECT '椎管内麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '椎管内麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '非插管全麻' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '非插管全麻大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID UNION ALL SELECT '复合麻醉' AS ITEM_NAME, C.ITEM_VALUE FROM MED_ANESTHESIA_CONFIG C START WITH C.ITEM_VALUE = '复合麻醉大类' CONNECT BY PRIOR C.ITEM_ID = C.ITEM_PARENTID ) select a.patient_id,a.visit_id,a.oper_id, a.inp_no, a.name, a.sex, a.age， a.dept_name deptname, a.operation_name, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') operdate, to_char(a.start_date_time, 'hh24:mi') opertime, a.OPERATION_SCALE oper_scale, decode(a.emergency_ind, 1, '急诊', '择期') emergency_ind, a.surgeon, a.anesmethod anes_method, a.asa asa_grade, a.anesdoctor anes_doctor, a.NURSE from v_operation_master_v2 a,main b where a.AnesMethod = b.item_value(+) and a.asa ='Ⅱ级' and oper_status_code > 35 and a.anes_start_time >=:STARTTIME and a.anes_start_time <= :ENDTIME and (a.dept_code like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or a.dept_name like '%'|| :deptcode ||'%' or :deptcode is null) AND ( a.asa =:ASACODE OR :ASACODE IS NULL ) and (a.OPER_ROOM = :VOPERROOM OR :VOPERROOM IS NULL) and ( b.ITEM_NAME =:VANESTYPE or ((a.anesmethod not in ( select d.ITEM_VALUE from main d ) or a.anesmethod is null ) and :VANESTYPE='其他麻醉方式' ) )
